Key Match Events: Jaden Ivey scored 22 points before suffering a potentially serious left leg injury
Cade Cunningham contributed 19 points, nine assists and eight rebounds
Jalen Duren had 18 points and 11 rebounds
Tim Hardaway Jr. tossed in 12 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons shot 64.1 percent from the field in the first half and grabbed a 65-49 halftime lead
Orlando scored on its first three possessions of the second half, prompting a Pistons timeout
Detroit quickly pushed the lead to 18, 73-55, on another 3-pointer by Ivey off a feed from Cunningham
Suggs then sparked an Orlando rally, contributing six points, a block and an assist during a 14-1 run
Orlando continued to put the pressure on. Carter’s basket with 7:40 remaining cut Detroit’s lead to three
Others: The Pistons have won four of their last five games
Jalen Suggs led the Magic with 24 points
Kentavious Caldwell-Pope had 21 points and Wendell Carter Jr. added 15 points and eight rebounds
